DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study : - compare two cognitive-behavioral treatment
DOC.detailed_description: 128 patient suffer chronic back pain randomly assign either Wait List Control , Cognitive Behavioral Treatment Cognitive Behavioral Treatment Biofeedback . Measures conduct 6 month treatment ( Wait List Control ) immediately treatment 6-months follow-up . 25 weekly 1-hr session individualize outpatient cognitive behavioral treatment chronic back pain Treatment element : Cognitive treatment : identification , evaluation correction dysfunctional belief pain cognitive restructuring , problem-solving training cop skill train Behavioural treatment : increase activity level ( sport , social activity , work ) , reduce medication intake unnecessary health care utilization Relaxation training : progressive muscle relaxation , biofeedback .
